alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 6:29PM CDT until March 26 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Tallapoosa County in east central Alabama... Southwestern Chambers County in east central Alabama... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Still Waters Resort, or 9 miles northwest of Notasulga, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dadeville, Camp Hill, Lafayette, La Fayette, Waverly, Sturkie, Trammel Crossroads, Ridge Grove, West Chambers, Daviston and Susannah Crossing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
